Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "If you have a task claimed, this will close the task with the closing message that you supply. Typically the closing message is the actions or steps taken to resolve the task. The message is then added to the notes section of the task so that it can be reviewed at a later date.\\r\\n\\r\\nThe command will also send an alert out to the TAS chatline with the task number, queue and closing message alerting those who are listening to the chatline that the task has been closed."
"+tas done 'I have fixed the bug that caused the problem.\\r\\n\\r\\n12:34 [TAS] \\"\<#1234/Bugs\> closed by Numpty: I have fixed the bug that caused the problem.\\""
